CustomField.description: If selected, only those Skills and Certifications for which the related resource has a corresponding Skill or Certification rating record are displayed. This reduces the number of Skills and Certifications available for selection on an experience record.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If selected, only those skills and certifications for which the related resource has a corresponding skill / certification rating record are displayed. This reduces the number of skills and certifications available for selection on an experience record.
CustomField.label: Restrict to Skills with Existing Rating
